Title: Ep #12587 Friday 08 May
Plot: Melanie struggles to figure out her place in Brady?s life now that he has a child with Theresa. John and Marlena have a slight thaw when he learns about her traumatic ordeal. Nicole throws Daniel for another loop. Cole causes major trouble for JJ.
